page.title: 19NEW MILK BOTTLES
page.content: On June 16th. 1985 new shaped milk bottles were introduced in the Durham area.They were to replace the old style bottles which had been in use since 1970. The new bottles were the idea of the bottle manufacturers and they have altered all their machinery to make them. The manufacturers claim tha they are cheaper to make,are lighter and will last longer. The new bottles are shorter and wider than the old ones and are supposed to be easier to handle. Apart from the bottle manufacturers the makers of milk crates are also very busy.They have to make and supply new crates into which the new bottles will fit.
